data.title: S-Bahn Berlin GmbH
data.meta_description: Die offizielle Homepage der S-Bahn Berlin GmbH. Fahrplan, Routenplaner, Erlebnis-Stadtplan, Tickets, Veranstaltungen, Ausflugstipps und vieles mehr.
data.text:
Line Overview

All schedule changes for now and the next 12 hours:

S1 Wannsee Oranienburg

S2 Blankenfelde Bernau

S2 Blankenfelde Bernau

Blankenfelde <> Priesterweg

07.08. (Wed), approx. 4 a.m. to 02.09. (Mon), approx. 1.30 a.m.

Information

Rail replacement bus service:

Bus S2X: Blankenfelde <> Priesterweg

this line runs Mon-Fri 5 a.m. - 9 p.m., Sat 7 a.m. - 9 p.m. and Sun 9 a.m. - 9 p.m.

Bus S2A: Blankenfelde <> Priesterweg

Bus S2B: Lichtenrade <> Lankwitz

Timetable change

Platform change

Please use the timetable information before starting your journey.

The timetable information provides all timetable changes incl. rail replacement services.

S25 Teltow Stadt Hennigsdorf

S26 Teltow Stadt Blankenburg

S3 Erkner Spandau

S3 Erkner Spandau

(Mahlsdorf) Alexanderplatz <> Zoologischer Garten (Westkreuz/Spandau)

07.08. (Wed), approx. 4 a.m. to 04.09. (Wed), approx. 1.30 a.m.

Information

Interval change:

Friedrichstraße <> Zoologischer Garten S-Bahn service only at 20-minutes interval with the S7

Temporary additional replacement bus services:

Bus S7: Friedrichstraße <> Zoologischer Garten

This line runs at 10-minutes interval monday to friday from 5.30 a.m. to 10 p.m., saturday 7.30 a.m. to 10 p.m. and sunday from 8.30 a.m. to 10 p.m.

Line swap:

The S1 runs between Wannsee and Potsdam Hbf (instead of the S7). S7 passengers should change in both directions in Wannsee. The journey continues after 5 to 6 minutes in front of the opposite side of the platform.

Interval change:

on 02.09. (Mon) and 03.09. (Tue): Mahlsdorf <> Friedrichsfelde Ost S-Bahn service only at 5-/5-/10-minutes interval

Timetable change

Platform change

Please use the timetable information before starting your journey.

The timetable information provides all timetable changes incl. rail replacement services.

Information

Wegen der Reparatur an einem Signal in Friedrichsfelde Ost kommt es auf den Linien S5, S7 und S75 zu Verspätungen und einzelnen Ausfällen.

Die Linie S75 verkehrt nur im 20-Minuten-Takt.

Wir bitten um Entschuldigung.
